snippet.title: Johnny Depp 'ended marriage to Amber Heard after he found a poo in his bed'
snippet.description: A court has heard  ended his marriage to Amber Heard after he found a poo in his bed.  The actor, 57, is suing News Group Newspapers over a story published in The Sun in 201 which branded him a "wife beater" - which he denies.  The libel trial kicked off at London's High Court today with both Depp and Heard, 32, in attendance and the subject of the 2016 poo incident was brought up in court documents.   In opening arguments, Depp's legal team told the court: "Depp who in the end was forced to finy c time on this relationship, largely after behaviour by her and her friends following her  birthday party in their flat in April 2016...   "(Including he says, one of them defecating on his bed, something which Ms Heard blames on their tiny dog)."  Depp witness statement was presented to the court, in which he addressed the incident in his own words - claiming Heard told their building manager the poo incident was a "harmless prank".    He said: "I understand that the following morning [after ...
